comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: I have not come across this site before but coming from your profile, I think it calls for concern.Too many negative tags on your trust ratings can't get this your ad to fly even if you were the most sincere and honest man in the space right now.Thanks for bringing the BSV coin back to my head though, still remember how it was launched and how it hit almost half a Bitcoin equivalent.

comments.author: Bitcoin SV
comments.body: Quote from: wallet4bitcoin on January 06, 2024, 11:56:48 PMToo many negative tags on your trust ratingsThis is because the forum administration considers us their enemies. They are afraid of competition with our coin. They are afraid that their dying BTC will not be able to compete with us.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin SV on January 18, 2024, 11:41:55 AMQuote from: wallet4bitcoin on January 06, 2024, 11:56:48 PMToo many negative tags on your trust ratingsThis is because the forum administration considers us their enemies. They are afraid of competition with our coin. They are afraid that their dying BTC will not be able to compete with us.Ita difficult to comprehend a 25 negative trust rating on your account coming as a result of the administration not liking youDo you mean to say just ONE person didn't take the pain of investigating your profile and activities just to be sure thst at least the general view of the forum about you might be wrong?

comments.author: Bitcoin SV
comments.body: Quote from: wallet4bitcoin on January 18, 2024, 04:14:38 PMQuote from: Bitcoin SV on January 18, 2024, 11:41:55 AMQuote from: wallet4bitcoin on January 06, 2024, 11:56:48 PMToo many negative tags on your trust ratingsThis is because the forum administration considers us their enemies. They are afraid of competition with our coin. They are afraid that their dying BTC will not be able to compete with us.Ita difficult to comprehend a 25 negative trust rating on your account coming as a result of the administration not liking youDo you mean to say just ONE person didn't take the pain of investigating your profile and activities just to be sure thst at least the general view of the forum about you might be wrong?It's okay, don't pay attention to it.The forum administration is our competitors. They did this on purpose so that no one would trust us.They can’t drown us and they’re mad about it
